mapper.insert: insert into trade.items (itemname, schoolzone, type, price, host, datetime,status) values (#{itemname},#{schoolzone},#{type},#{price},#{host},#{datetime},#{status})
mapper.select: select * from trade.items where itemname = #{itemname} and status = '未出售'
select * from trade.items where itemname like concat('%',#{itemname},'%') and status = '未出售'
select * from trade.items where schoolzone = #{schoolzone} and status = '未出售'
select * from trade.items where status = '未出售'
